reviewText: Our past few years Christmas night tradition with friends and family is to play "Shout about Movies". We love it!!!  Since they haven't come out with a new one recently, I purchased Party Games DVD.  Boy were we dissapointed.  The quality was embarrasing with the ease of technology, today.  I agree with the previous reviewer.  Please DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
I not only say this honestly but literally; my 5 year old child used Nero and made a more interactive DVD.
